data.title: Buñol/Bunyol > Moncofa
data.meta_description: Profile, time schedule, all informations on the stage
data.text:
Emphatic win for Jackson as Vas takes La Roja

144 riders took the start in the 2nd stage of La Vuelta Femenina 24 by Carrefour.es, which covered 118,3 kilometres from Bunyol to Moncofa, at 14:18. Idoia Eraso (Laboral Kutxa-Fundación Euskadi), Angela Oro (Bepink-Bongioanni) and Marine Allione (Winspace) went clear after 5 kilometres, creating a breakaway group that will be joined by Silvia Zanardi (Human Powered Health),...

Idoia Eraso (Laboral Kutxa-Fundación Euskadi): “We want to be seen”

We wanted to be in the breakaway today, and we made it. We knew it was our chance to be seen during the stage, and that later on we would have to support Nadia [Quagliotto] and Laura [Tomasi] for an eventual sprint. I’m happy I was on the break. It has been a demanding day for me, as it is always the case when you are at the front. Once in the Oronet climb, I gave it a...

Eleonora Ciabocco (Team dsm-firmenich PostNL): “We gave it all for Charlotte Kool today”

We gave it all for Charlotte [Kool] today. We wanted her to contest the sprint, and she came very close to do it after getting dropped in the climb and fighting her way back. With 3 kilometres to go, once I knew Juliette [Labous] was safe, I dropped back to help her regain a position at the front that enabled her to contend the sprint. We have two clear goals in this race: looking...
